song.title: Arkanoid (SID No More MIX)
song.info:
Can you feel it, see it, hear it today? Well, if you can't, then you've got to be deaf in some way And you will never understand what (...??? inaudible) And it feels like your ears are made of glass
It's so cool, it's so hip, it's so right It's so groovy, it's outta sight You can't touch it nor smell it but it still is so sweet And the sound of the SID makes you move your feet
You want a SID and you're gonna get it
[Splippen, ploppen?] that's what it's for So you flip the disk and then you listen some more You've got to sing it, got to say it, Then you bring it and then you play it
You want a SID and you're gonna get it (yeah, yeah, yeah) It's in your ears and you can't hear it (yeah, yeah, yeah)
It's alive, afraid, a lie, a sin It's magic, not tragic, and it plays when you win It's dry, not moist; it's a parent's pain I'm back, it happened and I'm not ashamed
It's SID (what is SID?) It's SID (what is SID?) It's the SID (but what is SID?) SID (what is SID?) It's the SID (yeah, but what the fuck is the SID?) It's the SID Oh, it's the SID (what is SID?) It's the SID (what is SID?) It's the SID It's the SID Oh, it's the SID Oh, it's the SID
